# AVCaptureDevice.AutoFocusRangeRestriction.far

**Case**

The device primarily attempts to focus on subjects far away from the camera.

## Declaration

```swift
case far
```

## Constants

- **AVCaptureDevice.AutoFocusRangeRestriction.none**: The device attempts to focus on objects at any range.
- **AVCaptureDevice.AutoFocusRangeRestriction.near**: The device primarily attempts to focus on subjects near the camera.

items.description: The device attempts to focus on objects at any range.
